If you're looking for a movie that explores themes of loss and regret, consider "Restless" (2006). The protagonist's journey through adulthood is filled with pain and self-discovery.

If you're interested in a classic love story with a strong emotional core, check out "Aladdin" (1992). The enduring love between a young man and his magical genie is a testament to the enduring power of love.

If you're seeking a suspenseful and action-packed film, "The Wraith" (1986) is a must-watch. The thrilling escape from a ruthless gang leader will keep you on the edge of your seat.
